mapper.insert: insert into user(email, pwd, name, phone, part, address1, address2, profileimg) values(#{email}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{part}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{profileimg})
mapper.update: update user set pwd=#{pwd} where email=#{email}
update user set name=#{name}, phone=#{phone}, address1=#{address1}, address2=#{address2} where email=#{email}
